verses.roman:
vihaṅgamāḥ kāmagamā
nirvāṇarucayaḥ surāḥ
indraś ca vaidhṛtas teṣām
ṛṣayaś cāruṇādayaḥ

synonyms: vihaṅgamāḥ—the Vihaṅgamas; kāmagamāḥ—the Kāmagamas; nirvāṇarucayaḥ—the Nirvāṇarucis; surāḥ—the demigods; indraḥ—the king of heaven, Indra; ca—also; vaidhṛtaḥ—Vaidhṛta; teṣām—of them; ṛṣayaḥ—the seven sages; ca—also; aruṇa-ādayaḥ—headed by Aruṇa.
translation: The Vihaṅgamas, Kāmagamas, Nirvāṇarucis and others will be the demigods. The king of the demigods, Indra, will be Vaidhṛta, and the seven sages will be headed by Aruṇa.
